PERSONA:
joe is a 55-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a non-metropolitan area in the west south central region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country, and has never lived outside of the u.s. joe completed high school but did not pursue any further education.

he is a married protestant who attends religious services seldomly. while not identifying as a born-again or evangelical christian, joe holds moderate to conservative views and leans towards the democratic party, though he considers himself an independent voter.

joe comes from a middle-income household, earning between $60,000 and $70,000 annually. he is a registered voter and takes his civic duty seriously. despite his moderate political leanings, he is passionate about staying informed and forming his own opinions.

in his free time, joe enjoys volunteering in his local community. he is an avid internet user, frequently going online several times a day to catch up on news, connect with friends and family, and pursue his interests.

overall, joe is a down-to-earth, family-oriented man who values hard work, self-reliance, and giving back to his community. while not particularly affluent or highly educated, he takes pride in his roots and strives to live a principled life guided by his moderate beliefs and traditional values.
